Class PEMReader

java.lang.Object
  java.io.Reader
      java.io.BufferedReader
          org.bouncycastle.util.io.pem.PemReader
              org.bouncycastle.openssl.PEMReader
                  nl.nikhef.jgridstart.util.PEMReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Readable
public class PEMReader
extends PEMReader

PEM-file reader

Identical to BouncyCastle's version, but this one always accepts garbage before and after the BEGIN/END object blocks. BouncyCastle 1.46 stopped accepting garbage at the beginning, and this class does accept it.

Note that BufferedReader.mark(int) and BufferedReader.reset() cannot be used because of this workaround.

Author:
wvengen
